title: About
author: Steven Ng
__content: # About Braintapper Braintapper helps you consolidate, transform and visualize your business data so that you can make better decisions. information@braintapper.com ## Links * [Github](https://github.com/braintapper) * [Linked In](https://www.linkedin.com/in/stevenhng/) # Privacy Policy This web site is hosted on [Github Pages](https://pages.github.com/). Please note that GitHub may collect information from visitors to this site, including logs of visitor IP addresses, to comply with legal obligations, and to maintain the security and integrity of the site and service. Traffic on this web site is tracked using Google Analytics. This involves the use of cookies to allow us to analyze trends, administer the site, track visitor movements around the site, and gather demographic information about our site's visitors. You may control the use of cookies at the browser level. If you choose to disable cookies, it will also disable any associated tracking related to the cookies we use.
html:
About Braintapper

Braintapper helps you consolidate, transform and visualize your business data so that you can make better decisions.

information@braintapper.com

Links

  • Github
  • Linked In

Privacy Policy

This web site is hosted on Github Pages. Please note that GitHub may collect information from visitors to this site, including logs of visitor IP addresses, to comply with legal obligations, and to maintain the security and integrity of the site and service.

Traffic on this web site is tracked using Google Analytics. This involves the use of cookies to allow us to analyze trends, administer the site, track visitor movements around the site, and gather demographic information about our site's visitors. You may control the use of cookies at the browser level. If you choose to disable cookies, it will also disable any associated tracking related to the cookies we use.
